changeSet.sql: Get group with parent group and move to group membership table INSERT INTO acm_group_membership SELECT ag.cm_group_parent_name AS cm_group_name, ag.cm_group_name AS cm_member_group_name FROM acm_group ag WHERE cm_group_type="LDAP_GROUP" AND cm_group_parent_name IS NOT NULL;
